verses.text: And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, But, behold, they will not \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* me, nor \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: for they will \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto thee.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What \add is\add* that in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cast|strong="H7993"\w* it on the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*. And he \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* it on the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and it became a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*; and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* it.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w take|strong="H0270"\w* it by the \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*. And he put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w caught|strong="H2388"\w* it, and it became a \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*:

That they may \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, hath \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto thee.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w furthermore|strong="H5750"\w* unto him, \w Put|strong="H0935"\w* now thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* into thy \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*. And he \w put|strong="H0935"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* into his \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*: and when he \w took|strong="H3318"\w* it out, behold, his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add was\add* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w* as \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Put|strong="H7725"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* into thy \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*. And he \w put|strong="H7725"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* into his \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*; and \w plucked|strong="H3318"\w* it out of his \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and, behold, it was turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w* as his \add other\add* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, if they will not \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* thee, neither \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w sign|strong="H0226"\w*, that they will \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w latter|strong="H0314"\w* \w sign|strong="H0226"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, if they will not \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* also these \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*, neither \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, that thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, and \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w dry|strong="H3004"\w* \add land:\add* and the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* which thou \w takest|strong="H3947"\w* out of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* shall become \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w dry|strong="H3006"\w* \add land\add*.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft shall become: Heb. shall be and shall be\f*

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w O|strong="H0994"\w* my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w I|strong="H0376"\w* \add am\add* not \w eloquent|strong="H1697"\w*, neither \w heretofore|strong="H8032"\w*, nor \w since|strong="H0227"\w* thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: but I \add am\add* \w slow|strong="H3515"\w* of \w speech|strong="H6310"\w*, and of a \w slow|strong="H3515"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.\f + \fr 4.10 \ft eloquent: Heb. a man of words\f*\f + \fr 4.10 \ft heretofore: Heb. since yesterday, nor since the third day\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Who hath \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*? or who \w maketh|strong="H7760"\w* the \w dumb|strong="H0483"\w*, or \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, or the \w seeing|strong="H6493"\w*, or the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*? have not I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*?
Now therefore \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, and I will be with thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee what thou shalt \w say|strong="H1696"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H0994"\w* my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w send|strong="H7971"\w*, I pray thee, by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add of him whom\add* thou wilt \w send|strong="H7971"\w*.\f + \fr 4.13 \ft wilt: or, shouldest\f*

And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* not \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*? I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that he can \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w well|strong="H1696"\w*. And also, behold, he cometh \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* thee: and when he \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* thee, he will be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: and I will be with thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and with his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and will \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* you what ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

And he shall be thy \w spokesman|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and he shall be, \add even\add* he shall be to thee instead of a \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and thou shalt be to him instead of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* this \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, wherewith thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jethro|strong="H3500"\w* his father in \w law|strong="H2859"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Let me \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, I pray thee, and \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* which \add are\add* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* whether they be \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*. And \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.\f + \fr 4.18 \ft Jethro: Heb. Jether\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: for all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* are \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* which \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7392"\w* them upon an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, When thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all those \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, which I have \w put|strong="H7760"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: but I will \w harden|strong="H2388"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, that he shall not let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add is\add* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \add even\add* my \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*:

And I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Let my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that he may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me: and if thou \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, behold, I will \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \add even\add* thy \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* in the \w inn|strong="H4411"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w met|strong="H6298"\w* him, and \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* him.

Then \w Zipporah|strong="H6855"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a sharp \w stone|strong="H6864"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w foreskin|strong="H6190"\w* of her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H5060"\w* \add it\add* at his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely a \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w husband|strong="H2860"\w* \add art\add* thou to me.\f + \fr 4.25 \ft sharp…: or, knife\f*\f + \fr 4.25 \ft cast…: Heb. made it touch\f*

So he let him \w go|strong="H7503"\w*: then she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w husband|strong="H2860"\w* \add thou art\add*, because of the \w circumcision|strong="H4139"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w met|strong="H6298"\w* him in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* him.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* who had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him, and all the \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* which he had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w believed|strong="H0539"\w*: and when they \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and that he had \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* upon their \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*, then they bowed their \w heads|strong="H6915"\w* and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*.
